fullplot: A downtrodden photographer, haunted by the urban violence and decay around him, retreats into an inner world of dark fantasies. Those dangerous visions explode in reality with deadly consequences when his intoxicating new relationship with a beautiful young woman goes sour.
plot: A downtrodden photographer, haunted by the urban violence and decay around him, retreats into an inner world of dark fantasies.
title: Crave
